For sale: $720,000. Grand Opening of "The Slate" on Astoria Blvd.

421A Tax Abated. This newly developed 28 unit Condominium offers residents a fully furnished rooftop deck with astounding NYC skyline views. The 1st level deck includes a fitness center with Cybex equipment and televisions. Pet friendly condo with outdoor pet play area on the 2nd level deck including doggy run and turf for your buddies. Truly a magnificent space for entertainment and summer lounging. Bike storage is available to all residents. Remote accessible parking available. Laundry on-site. Verizon FIOS HBO & Showtime along with Internet & WIFI are all inclusive in the Common Charges.

Residence 501 gets northern exposure with tons of lighting and floor to ceiling glass. The bedroom is spacious with a large floor to ceiling closet and large double panel windows. Delaware Bay Drift hardwood flooring is layed throughout the home. The kitchen includes ample cabinetry and is finished with quartz granite counters. GE stainless steel appliances include refrigerator, microwave, dishwasher, and gas range stove. The bath is tiled to the ceiling with porcelain and includes a standing glass enclosed shower with waterfall head. The vanity is floating with a large vanity mirror. The open living area is ideal for bulky furniture and great for entertainment. All units include PTAC heating units in all rooms.

Located 1 block from the Astoria Blvd N/W train hub and 7 minutes to Midtown. Multiple public transit options are at your disposal including subway, bus, and multiple highways.

For sale: $1,099,000. 760 square feet with 1,180 square feet of PRIVATE outdoor space. Sleek and Modern, the units in this newly constructed building have unparalleled attention to detail within the solidly crafted construction. With sophisticated amenities and style, the expansive apartments feature 10 to 11 ft ceilings, stunning 7" wide hardwood plank flooring, high efficiency recessed lighting, European 8' tilt and turn windows and 9 ' European lift and sliding doors, all interior doors, imported from Italy, are 8 feet. Sumptuous bathroom with dual entry, Calacatta porcelain floor to ceiling tiling, soaking tub, separate luxurious shower with matching hardware from Spain and radiant floor heating. Stunning kitchens with high end Blomberg appliances including chefs convection oven, whisper quiet dishwasher and true exhaust as well as full quartz counter-tops and glass tile backsplash, Italian contrasting cabinetry and German hardware add to the exquisite contemporary flair. This main floor unit features a private garden and patio on over 1,180 sq ft. Special details include electrical ductless split system for heating and cooling with remote control - in unit laundry and extra closet space make these units extraordinary in design. The many building amenities include camera security system, energy efficient mechanicals and construction materials, full building fire sprinkler system with central station fire alarm. Stunning roof deck with porcelain tiled pavers and 360-degree vistas with NYC skyline. Close to all one could need with NYC transit a mere few blocks away, this building is the ultimate in 21st century urban living.

For sale: $400,000. Presenting Astoria Lights four completely renovated pre-war co-op buildings that have been re-imagined and reinvigorated with open, loft-style floor plans, cutting edge amenities and sophisticated modern style while maintaining the pre-war charm. Smartly designed with a focus on how we live today, this home combines an open layout with pre-war architectural detail and loft-style touches. The bedrooms are massive and the closet space is not comparable to the new condos being built in the area. Its truly is a remarkable space.


Spacious and sun drenched one bedroom one bathroom apartment with an open kitchen layout overlooking the beautiful living room. A large kitchen featuring brand new counter tops, and stainless steel appliances. The windowed bathroom is also a lovely touch for this priced to sell apartment. Pre-war hardwood floors with mahogany inlay, traditional pre-war moldings and excellent light add to the personality of this unit. A washer & dryer hook up in unit.

Ask about the parking garage space as well.


At home, enjoy a vast furnished roof deck dubbed the "sky-deck" for stargazing and skyline views. Stylish shared spaces for entertaining, ample bike and personal storage, in-building laundry facilities and a fitness center. 
 The complex is in the mist of adding a tenants lounge, child center just off a new office center for the residence. This will truly be an amenities complex at a bargain price.


No convenience has been overlooked. Out and about, savor everything Astoria has to offer: cuisines from around the world; local boutiques and shops; and a warm, vibrant community, truly unique in every way imaginable.


This is truly a great home, so make your appointment today...

For sale: $1,525,000. Built in 1910, this Astoria townhouse has plenty of upside that allows for tremendous growth and value. Located one block from Steinway Street- Astoria's shopping corridor, and less than half a mile to the BQE and Grand Central highways, as well as being near to transit hubs like the RFK bridge, 30th Avenue Subway Station and Astoria Boulevard Subway Station. You will never be far from anything at 24-22 41st Street. 



This two-unit townhouse features a three bedroom apartment, over a three bedroom duplexed apartment complete with over 800sqft of entertaining space on the lower level with a large backyard. 



The top-floor unit boasts nine windows and features an open living and dining space plus three bedrooms. Two bedrooms face East for morning light, and the third faces West for afternoon light. The eat in kitchen is large enough for a table and chairs, and there is a large pantry off the kitchen for the real gourmand. 



The duplex apartment provides nearly 1,800sqft of living space. Already turn-key, this apartment has enough room for you to grow. The upper level features the bedrooms along side the kitchen and living area, and the downstairs portion enables your creative mind to roam, complete with a full bathroom. The upstairs kitchen overlooks the backyard, so you can watch your vegetable garden grow while cooking some great dishes, and those dishes will definetely benefit from the dishwasher! The duplex apartment has three separate entrances, so privacy can be kept. 



Ceiling heights for both above grade floors rise nearly ten feet, and the lower level at seven feet. 



Current zoning laws allow for 760sqft of buildable footage left, which would be for an addition of a floor + amazing roof deck, or the ability to build out and have an extension on this R5 lot. Due diligence required. 



Income producing, this high-net building generates a 5% cap rate for your investment. 



Upstairs unit is currently vacant, and the duplex apartment has leases until August 2019.

For sale: $765,000. Modern meets classic in this stunning 1000 Sq Ft 2br in the coveted Astoria Lights. Perched on the fourth floor, this sunbathed west facing home has the high ceilings of a prewar building and generously proportioned rooms throughout.  Super modern chefs kitchen with Bertazzoni stainless steel over, Bosch dishwasher and Fisher Paykal refrigerator. Peninsula bar seating, ample cabinet space and an extra deep full height pantry with custom cabinets. Spacious living room with exposed brick wall, formal dining area and inlayed hardwood floors. Double width closet in the hallway features laundry hookups plus storage.

Two private king sized bedrooms separated by and spectacular gleaming white bathroom with soaking tub and windowed shower. Both bedrooms have double wide, extra deep closets with custom closet system in the master bedroom. Astoria Lights is an Astoria treasure. Well run and well thought out, the complex offers and fitness center, a roof top terrace, bike and personal storage. New amenities currently being added include community room, library and a playroom.

For sale: $1,999,000. Stunning and spacious, this Astoria legal three family is in pristine condition. Thoughtfully designed throughout with every detail carefully attended to, the owners duplex is almost 2500 sq ft consisting of the first floor and walk-in levels. First floor, with it's 9 ft ceilings, includes recessed lighting, imported Italian porcelain tile floors, gourmet custom kitchen with peninsula seating, granite countertops and stainless steal appliances plus camera compatible alarm system. Formal dining room with seating for ten opens to the immaculate living room with gas fireplace with marble mantle. Gorgeous Windowed bathroom. Walk-in level features fitness room, split unit AC, walk-in cedar closet, TV room, laundry room, office space and room for guests plus additional bath and outside entrance. 

Top floor features two totally updated one bedroom units. Front unit was updated last year with new kitchen and new bath. Both currently occupied with excellent tenants in place. 10 ft wide common driveway leads to a rear yard with a detached garage and space for additional parking and room to enjoy outside seating. The house has been completely renovated with all major systems updated. New roof, updated electric and plumbing throughout; new brick pointing, iron work and staircase in front plus new windows and detached garage with custom carriage house style doors.

For sale: $1,600,000. EXTREMELY RARE & SPECIAL OFFERING: Spacious two family brick townhouse with massive private courtyard and balcony. Located on the corner of 47th Street and 43rd Avenue, in the heart of Sunnyside Gardens.

Gorgeous circa 1925 two family brick townhouse, located on a 25 x 72.33 lot, with approximately 2,488 residential square feet and 1,442 exterior square feet. Perfect for the buyer seeking an owner-occupied home with rental income, or one who envisions creating a fabulous single-family home that spans a total of 3,930 sf.

Entering directly through the left entrance the first unit is a true duplex. A combination of the the first floor and a fully finished basement. The largest of the two units, the spacious and open layout has two bedrooms, two bathrooms, a recreational area in the basement and access from both levels to the backyard and incredible private courtyard. There is an updated galley kitchen that leads directly to the backyard. All bedrooms can easily fit king sized beds. Both bathrooms have large showers, and have been retiled and refinished with a full range of modern appliances. Located directly upstairs from the main entrance, the second unit is currently rented at $2,900 a month. The main level has a galley kitchen. The spacious living area offers quick access to the full bathroom and two bedrooms. Directly upstairs is the third bedroom, as well as access to your very own outdoor space_that overlooks the incredible courtyard. Both units feature stainless steel appliances and hardwood floors throughout. 

Sunnyside Gardens boasts a bustling restaurant scene, quiet tree-lined streets and direct access to the area's private park. The home is a mere few blocks away from the 7 train at the 46th street station and offers an easy 15 minute commute to midtown Manhattan, as well as Long Island and the Queens Center Mall.

For sale: $228,888. A very cozy Studio apartment in the Heart of Sunnyside.  Close to New York City. Only a few blocks away from the train. Inground Pool with Sitting area and showers. Lots of closets.

For sale: $1,150,000. LOCATION, LOCATION, LOCATION!-- SUNNYSIDE GARDENS -- CLOSE TO #7 TRAIN TO MIDTOWN
This charming, updated One Family House is located on a beautiful tree-lined street in Sunnyside Gardens. The welcoming, enclosed entry porch leads to the living room and first floor open layout. The renovated kitchen with double windows features a four burner Viking stove, stainless steel refrigerator and new dishwasher. The dining room's sliding glass doors leads to the large deck with builtin benches. The spacious Master bedroom featuring floor to ceiling built in closets is located in the from of the house with two South exposure windows. The second floor rear bedroom also features floor to ceiling closets with a North exposure, The renovated windowed bathroom invites you with an Ultra Bain Spa 72-jet tub/shower.

The semi-finished basement includes a laundry area, work area, 1/2 bath,and storage and recreation area. This property is 2 blocks to the #7 train to midtown Manhattan. Shopping, restaurants/bars, cafes, schools and library close by. This property is zoned for membership(fee required) in the Sunnyside Gardens Park.
